item.description:
Lets meet at the Burin Irish Pub in Davis square and have a few beers! We will talk about some ideas for organizing, such as promoting and distributing the Rock Creek Press, training ourselves to lobby the bigwigs and getting more media savvy.

Its going to be casual, and a chance to socialize and discuss 9/11 activism.

I'll be there at 6:30pm to grab a table, plan to come at 7pm.

Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with 9/11 gear

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Boston 9/11 Truth February Meetup
